message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident you'll see the benefit in this deal.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to pay $1300000 for your product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still holding out for $1350000. This price is still very competitive considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal!
Alice, I understand your position, but I would like to propose $1325000 as the price for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
